name: Class DESedeKeySpec
text: This class specifies a DES-EDE ("triple-DES") key.
codes:
public class DESedeKeySpec
extends Object
implements KeySpec

fields.description: The constant which defines the length of a DESede key in bytes.

methods.description:
Checks if the given DES-EDE key, starting at offset
 inclusive, is parity-adjusted.
